name: tri-attack
flavor_text: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.  One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
effect_text_simple: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
